homeHero.title: Welcome to My Home Page
homeHero.text: This is a simple static home page created with Next.js and React. It showcases some basic content and styling.

homeAbout.title: About Our Project
homeAbout.text: We're on a mission to revolutionize web development with cutting-edge tools and technologies. Our platform empowers developers to build faster, more efficient, and highly scalable web applications.

ourValues.title: Secure
